pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:0.5: 47. The training rule on monastery robes
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.2: At that time the nun Thullanandā did not relinquish the monastery robe and continued using it.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.3: Other menstruating nuns did not get to use it
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.4: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.5: “How can Venerable Thullanandā not relinquish the monastery robe and continue using it?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.6: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.9: “… How can the nun Thullanandā not relinquish the monastery robe and continue using it?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.10: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.11: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:1.12: ‘If a nun does not relinquish a monastery robe but continues to use it, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.1.6: it is given specifically for the use of menstruating nuns.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.1.7: Does not relinquish […] but continues to use it:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.1.8: if she uses it for two or three days, washes it on the fourth day, and then uses it again without relinquishing it to a nun or a trainee nun or a novice nun, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.2.1: If it is not relinquished, and she does not perceive it as relinquished, and she uses it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.2.2: If it is not relinquished, but she is unsure of it, and she uses it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.2.3: If it is not relinquished, but she perceives it as relinquished, and she uses it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.2.4: If it is relinquished, but she does not perceive it as relinquished, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.2.5: If it is relinquished, but she is unsure if it is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.2.6: If it is relinquished, and she perceives it as relinquished, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.3.2: if she relinquishes it and then uses it;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.3.3: if she uses it again at the next turn;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.3.4: if there is no other menstruating nun;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.3.5: if her robe has been stolen;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.3.6: if her robe has been lost;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.3.9: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc47:2.3.10: The seventh training rule is finished.
